TopicTitle: Can someone identify this for me

Articles.Content:
Hi all , not sure if this is a request but it is a request for help, I used to have this parts pack "Lucern"???? something like that , it had 3 engines,2x 5m , and 1 , 10m

here is a picture of the 5 metre engine in action , I cant find the pack online as I might have the name wrong , and I lost my old hard drive

they are nuclear and run on liquid fuel and ox

help!

Edited May 21, 2015 by sploooshman

Ah yes, the Leucome fusion engines. One of my favourite mods, though I currently use a modified version of it. Alas, the only 'official' link I've got for these engines is dead, but I do have them myself. I haven't seen any activity from the guy who was supposed to be maintaining the mod for quite a while, so... here you go. Updated to 1.0 for you (hopefully)

I should be alright sharing it, according to the readme file included, as I'm not claiming it's mine. That said, I think I'll send a PM to the guy who's supposed to be looking after the mod to see if he replies. If not, I might see about undertaking maintenance on this mod myself, maybe even expanding it a bit to include my modifications... hmm...

oh you absolute legend , last time i looked a long time ago i found the dead page of the guy that made it , so thanks , they go great with the PMI fuel gen and large solar sails , for cheating my way around RSS , however im sure one day we will discover a way to generate efficient fuel while on the go in space so im just a little ahead of our time

thank so much
